DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study collect blood sample pregnant woman achieve pregnancy follow in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) Natera 's preimplantation aneuploidy screening ( without single gene gene test ) . These sample use test development non-invasive prenatal diagnostic testing .
DOC.brief_title: Collection Maternal Blood Samples Development Non-invasive Prenatal Diagnostic Testing
DOC.detailed_description: Eligible subject sign consent form blood drawn approximately 8-17 week gestation . Subjects receive $ 200 reimbursement provide blood sample . The collected sample use help develop non-invasive prenatal diagnostic test use Natera 's Parental Support technology already commercialize genetic diagnosis in-vitro embryo . In study , technology test 's ability analyze fetal-specific piece DNA isolate mother 's blood . No result maternal blood test report subject physician .
DOC.criteria: Pregnant woman willing donate blood sample first second trimester pregnancy ( approximately 817 week gestation ) Use Natera ( formerly Gene Security Network ) 's commercial preimplantation genetic testing ( PGS/PGD ) achieve current pregnancy Pregnant woman use Natera ( formerly Gene Security Network ) 's PGS/PGD test achieve current pregnancy
